article: Helen and Sally are cousins. Helen is a writer. She lives  _  to Sally, She is  _  writing every day. She doesn't want to talk to others when she is  _  . Her friends know her well. If they want to see her, they often  _  her first. If Helen tells them she has  _  , they will come to her house. Sally works in a  bank  , She is a bank clerk. She has lots of friends and they often come to see her and talk with her.  _  Helen can't write well when they are talking. She doesn't know what to  _  to Sally. Now Helen is talking about it with her best friend Ruth. Ruth is  _  to help Helen. She says, "You can put a note on  _  door. It would say, 'Nobody is at home. Please come another day.'"
